categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starship classes

nodes.text: The Providence-class Carrier was a model of Providence-class Dreadnought used by the Confederacy navy that was active during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. These vessels were propelled by engines and either side of their hull was plastered with the emblem of the Confederacy, and were painted with stripes in the blue color of the Confederacy.
